mapper.select: SELECT u.userName, r.bucketReplySeq, r.bucketSeq, r.regDate, r.replyContents, r.userId FROM bucketreply r JOIN itdauser u on r.userId = u.userId WHERE bucketSeq = #{bucketSeq} ORDER BY r.regDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUCKETLIST (bucketSeq ,userId, regDate, title, contents, goalDate, type, familySeq, filename, filepath) VALUES (bucketSeq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{contents}, NULL, 'Family', #{familySeq}, #{filename}, #{filepath})

INSERT INTO BUCKETLIST (bucketSeq ,userId, regDate, title, contents, goalDate, type, familySeq, filename, filepath) VALUES (bucketSeq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{contents}, NULL, 'Personal', #{familySeq}, #{filename}, #{filepath})
mapper.update:
update BUCKETLIST set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, filepath = #{filepath}, filename = #{filename}, goalDate = SYSDATE
where bucketSeq = #{bucketSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUCKETREPLY (bucketReplySeq, bucketSeq, regDate, replyContents, userId) VALUES (bucketReplySeq.NEXTVAL, #{bucketSeq}, SYSDATE, #{replyContents}, #{userId})
